websiteDescription: Welcome to our comprehensive Pantone color chart. Here you can explore, search, and find detailed information about Pantone colors, including their names, HEX codes, and RGB values.
disclaimer: Disclaimer: This website is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with Pantone LLC. The Pantone® name and related trademarks are owned by Pantone LLC.
aboutUsDescription: We are not an official Pantone dealer, nor are we affiliated with or endorsed by Pantone. This site is not officially approved by Pantone. We offer a wide selection of industry and government color standards for reference purposes.
copyright: © 2024 Color Chart. All rights reserved. This site is not affiliated with or endorsed by Pantone.
